mapper.insert: insert into MItem (ID, ItemID, Name, Type, TableName, UpdateHead, Unit, ItemType, STTP, Method, Sort) values (#{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemID,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{tableName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{updateHead,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{itemType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{STTP,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{method,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update MItem set ItemID = #{itemID,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, Name = #{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, Type = #{type,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, TableName = #{tableName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, UpdateHead = #{updateHead,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, Unit = #{unit,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, ItemType = #{itemType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, STTP = #{STTP,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, Method = #{method,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, Sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, ItemID, Name, Type, TableName, UpdateHead, Unit, ItemType, STTP, Method, Sort from MItem where ID = #{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select ID, ItemID, Name, Type, TableName, UpdateHead, Unit, ItemType, STTP, Method, Sort from MItem
